msbt.message: You made it to the goal!Huh? Hey Have we met before? You seem kinda familiar, butOh! Sorry! I've been traveling to a LOT of different islands lately, and I'm pretty bad with names and faces.This is my first time on this island. It's, uh, a pretty weird island, isn't it? What brings you here, anyway?
Tom Nook sent me!
It's a secret!

Wait. You know Tom Nook?! He's the reason I'm here too! I mean, I'm here because he invited me.He told me he put together a very interesting attraction on this island and I should check it outBut I didn't expect to find a maze! Mya ha ha ha howr! What a surprise!Soif you know Tom Nook, does that mean you live on the same island as he does?
It shore does!
Yep! It's a-maze-ing!

Mya ha ha ha howr! A secret? Well, now I'm really intrigued!See, I'm here because of my pal Tom Nook.He told me he put together a very interesting attraction on this island and I should check it outBut I didn't expect to find a maze! Mya ha ha ha howr! What a surprise!So, wait If you're here, does that mean you know Tom Nook too?
Yup!
That's a secret!
Neat!I hear Nook's been putting a ton of work into that place What was it called again?Oh yeah! , right?
Ding ding ding!
Winner, winner!
I knew it!So, thenare you living on the same island as Tom Nook right now? What was it called again?Oh yeah! , right?
Ding ding ding!
Winner, winner!
Mya ha ha ha howr! I knew it! Hey, you're pretty interesting, you know?If all you island folks are this much fun, I bet 's great!
You got a name, by the way?Uh-huh Uh-huh, eh? Great name, great name.I'm glad we met, ! I want to commemorate this occasion by giving you a gift.
That's great! I bet it's a blast hanging out with Tom Nook on an island all the time.I hear he's been putting a ton of work into that place What was it called again?Oh yeah! , right?
Ding ding ding!
Winner, winner!
You're just full of secrets, aren't you? But I bet I can figure this out.Let's see I thinkHey, are you from that island Nook told me about? What was it called again?Oh yeah! , right?
Ding ding ding!
Winner, winner!
Oh, gosh Your pockets are fullCome talk to me after you get rid of some stuff, OK?
Oh! You're back! Here you go—a gift from me to you.
It's so great to meet you. I mean, what are the odds? I really didn't expect to have this much fun here. One thing's for sure. I'm hoping fate will bring us together again sometime. See you later!
Y'know, I think I'll hang out on this island a little longer. I like it here.
It's nice to take a plane every once in a while. I'm used to traveling by train "Ridin' the rails," as they say.
I wonder which island I should visit next I just love that each one offers its own adventure and personality.
Tom Nook has really made a name for himself.<10_4 /> Not bad for a guy who used to own little more than an apron!
Were you able to finish the maze like you wanted, by the way?If you want to restart, you can do so by using the Rescue Service app on your NookPhone.
